title: Computer Gaming World (1981-2006)
description:
This is a torrent containing all issues of the Computer Gaming World, Computer
Game Forum and Softline magazines downloaded from the Computer Gaming World
Museum website: http://www.cgwmuseum.org/

All credit goes to the makers and contributors of the magazines and everyone
involved in digitizing and hosting the issues.



The website has a word reference index available for download, but its effective use requires all issues to be in the same root directory. This torrent has the issues sorted in year-specific folders.
